edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller

Class SourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.qod.controller.SourceController

  • @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Source.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/sources")
public class SourceController
extends Object
    Defines REST endpoints for servicing requests on Source resources, invoking SourceRepository methods to perform the required operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourceController(SourceRepository sourceRepository, QuoteRepository quoteRepository)
      Initializes this instance, injecting an instance of SourceRepository and an instance of QuoteRepository.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Source attach(UUID sourceId, Quote quote)
      Associates the Quote specified in the request body with the Source referenced by the path parameter.
      Source attach(UUID sourceId, UUID quoteId)
      Associates the Quote referenced in the path with the Source, also referenced by a path parameter.
      void delete(UUID sourceId)
      Deletes the specified Source resource from the database.
      void detach(UUID sourceId, UUID quoteId)
      Removes the association between the referenced Source resource and the referenced Quote resource.
      Iterable<Source> get()
      Returns a sequence of all the Source resources in the database.
      Source get(UUID sourceId)
      Retrieves and returns the Source resource with the specified ID.
      Quote get(UUID sourceId, UUID quoteId)
      Retrieves and returns the referenced Quote resource associated with the referenced Source resource.
      Iterable<Quote> list(UUID sourceId)
      Retrieves and returns all of the referenced Quote resources associated with the referenced Source resource.
      void notFound()
      Maps (via annotation) a NoSuchElementException to a response status code of HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Source> post(Source source)
      Adds the provided Source resource to the database and returns the completed resource, including timestamp & ID.
      void put(UUID sourceId, Source update)
      Replaces the name (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Source resource with the name from the provided resource.
      Iterable<Source> search(String fragment)
      Returns a sequence of Source resources, containing the specified text.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourceController

        @Autowired
public SourceController(SourceRepository sourceRepository,
                                    QuoteRepository quoteRepository)
        Initializes this instance, injecting an instance of SourceRepository and an instance of QuoteRepository.
        Parameters:
        sourceRepository - repository used for operations on Source entity instances.
        quoteRepository - repository used for operations on Quote entity instances.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        @GetMapping(value="search",
            produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Source> search(@RequestParam(value="q")
                                                                                                      String fragment)
        Returns a sequence of Source resources, containing the specified text.
        Parameters:
        fragment - text to match (case-insensitive).
        Returns:
        sequence of Source resources.

      • get

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Source> get()
        Returns a sequence of all the Source resources in the database.
        Returns:
        sequence of Source resources.

      • post

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Source> post(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                   Source source)
        Adds the provided Source resource to the database and returns the completed resource, including timestamp & ID. The provided resource is only required to contain a name property, with a non-null value.
        Parameters:
        source - partial Source resource.
        Returns:
        completed Source resource.

      • get

        @GetMapping(value="{sourceId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Source get(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                             UUID sourceId)
        Retrieves and returns the Source resource with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - source UUID.
        Returns:
        retrieved Source resource.

      • put

        @PutMapping(value="{sourceId}",
            consumes="application/json")
public void put(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                           UUID sourceId,
                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                           Source update)
        Replaces the name (which is the only consumer-specifiable property) of the referenced existing Source resource with the name from the provided resource.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - source UUID.
        update - Source resource to use to replace contents of existing source.

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="{sourceId}")
 @ResponseStatus(value=NO_CONTENT)
public void delete(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                           UUID sourceId)
        Deletes the specified Source resource from the database.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - source UUID.

      • attach

        @PostMapping(value="{sourceId}/quotes",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
public Source attach(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                                                                    UUID sourceId,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                    Quote quote)
        Associates the Quote specified in the request body with the Source referenced by the path parameter. Only the id property of the Quote must be specified.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - UUID of Source resource.
        quote - Quote to be associated with referenced Source.
        Returns:
        updated Source resource.

      • list

        @GetMapping(value="{sourceId}/quotes",
            produces="application/json")
public Iterable<Quote> list(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                              UUID sourceId)
        Retrieves and returns all of the referenced Quote resources associated with the referenced Source resource. If the latter does not exist, this method will fail.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - UUID of Source resource.
        Returns:
        collection of Quote resources associated with specified Source.

      • attach

        @PutMapping(value="{sourceId}/quotes/{quoteId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Source attach(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                                 UUID sourceId,
                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                                                 UUID quoteId)
        Associates the Quote referenced in the path with the Source, also referenced by a path parameter.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - UUID of Source resource.
        quoteId - UUID of Quote to be associated with referenced Source.
        Returns:
        updated Source resource.

      • get

        @GetMapping(value="{sourceId}/quotes/{quoteId}",
            produces="application/json")
public Quote get(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                                                             UUID sourceId,
                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                                                             UUID quoteId)
        Retrieves and returns the referenced Quote resource associated with the referenced Source resource. If either does not exist, or if the referenced quote is not associated with the source, this method will fail.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - UUID of Source resource.
        quoteId - UUID of Quote associated with referenced Source.
        Returns:
        referenced Quote resource.

      • detach

        @DeleteMapping(value="{sourceId}/quotes/{quoteId}")
public void detach(@PathVariable(value="sourceId")
                                                                        UUID sourceId,
                                                                        @PathVariable(value="quoteId")
                                                                        UUID quoteId)
        Removes the association between the referenced Source resource and the referenced Quote resource. If either does not exist, or if the referenced source is not associated with the quote, this method will fail.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - UUID of Source resource.
        quoteId - UUID of Quote to be disassociated from the referenced Source.

      • notFound

        @ResponseStatus(value=NOT_FOUND,
                reason="Resource not found")
 @ExceptionHandler(value=java.util.NoSuchElementException.class)
public void notFound()
        Maps (via annotation) a NoSuchElementException to a response status code of HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.
